summary: This mod is about Yondaime's Jutsu: Flying Thunder God. You will have 9 Kunai to place them at any place you like, and within few seconds you will be able to teleport yourself to any of those kunai.
descriptionHtml:
*** Description ***
This mod is about Yondaime's Jutsu: Flying Thunder God. You will have 9 Kunai to place them at any place you like, and within few seconds you will be able to teleport yourself to any of those kunai.

*** Advantages ***
- it is easy to use and all it takes is casting a spell and a click.
- you are at a sensitive spot and the game will not allow you to return (Example: Sovngarde,...), just leave behind one of the Kunai there and return later.
- you keep losing your follower? want to track some NPC? just give him one kunai (or slip one by pickpocket) and teleport to him at will.

*** Disadvantages ***
- you cannot teleport to a Kunai inside a container (but at dagger racks it works)
- there is only 9 for now.

*** Installation ***
just unzip the files inside the file inside the root Skyrim folder.

*** Uninstallation ***
just delete the files you extracted. if you don't know them delete those:

- Yellow Flash.esp
- scriptsYellowFlashMenu.pex
- scriptssourceYellowFlashMenu.psc
- meshesweaponsNarutoyfd.nif
- TexturesWeaponsYondaimes Fliegender Donnergott-Kunayondaimekunai.DDs

*** Place to find them andd how it works ***
just go to Elisif's royal room at Blue Palace at solitude. and check the table at the right when you enter the room, you will find 9 kunai and the spell tome to teach you the jutsu.
author: hfiani
